header.title: Already using some other accounting software for your business? Don’t worry. We’ve got you covered!
header.description: You can convert your Amazon MTR into formats that can be easily imported inside all these softwares.

button.label: SIGN up for a free trial

sections.header: Amazon MTR to Tally, Vyapar, QuickBooks or Zoho
sections.description: Designed for Amazon sellers with offline presence. For such sellers, there's no option to import Amazon MTR in these general-purpose bookkeeping softwares. As such, copy-pasting individual invoice data into these softwares becomes a very cumbersome, time-consuming and inaccurate process.

textSection: With this feature, FliqBook makes it very smooth to merge your online Amazon data with your offline business data!
